Articles.Content:
I teleport you directly under Apollo 11 as it's launching.

My hill.

I come back from the dead and eat you

my hill

Anti-zombie team dispached! ([Brony stuffs, don't touch](http://th02.deviantart.net/fs70/PRE/i/2011/309/0/d/___zombie_ponies____by_captricosakara-d4f6kkh.jpg))

My zombie-free hill

Disposes of your hill with a elite Marines corp.

My fortified hill

A refined version of the ZEUS project obliterates your bunker.

My hill.

I send an army of spacemarines capture your plain hill

My Spacemarines-controled hill

I roll a katermari onto your hill

my hill

I nullify gravity, causing your katamari-hill to disintegrate. 

My floating hill.

I strap boosters to your hill, kick you off, and stick it in orbit.

My astronomical hill.

I rendezvous with your hill and throw you out the airlock.

My hill IN SPACE.

I launch a salvo of rockets from my space station and blow up your hill.

My orbiting chunks of debris.

I cover your space station in pieces of the hill.

My hill-station.

Covenant invasion shuttle,

My alien hill-station

I breach the hull and the station decompresses.

My orbiting hunk of metal and earth.

I throw you down the station's reactor.

My space hill.

I lanch you in outer-space

My robot-free hill

I load my quicksave.

My normal, non-orbiting hill.

I Stab you.

my hill

I release the Kraken.

My shaking hill with stuff flying off of it.
I kill the kracken in .20 my Bop Hill.

I grab you, hit you against the wall a few times, fling you out the window, and claim your hill.

My hill.

I launch you directly into Jool.

My hill.

resurect the Kraken and use him against you!

My Kraken-temple hill

I fly back through the window using a orbital fly by of the mun and bitch slap you and your kracken

My hill ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

I give Jebediah my rocket. 'Nuff said.

My now-inverted hill.
